title: Countryside Walk and Stories
shortDescription: A gentle walk through the Apulian countryside, with local tales
description: Take a leisurely walk along dry-stone walls and olive trees in the Apulian countryside. Along the way, your local guide will share stories and traditions of rural life. A slow-paced experience perfect for all ages.

host.name: Angela D.
host.description: Born and raised in the Apulian countryside, I love sharing the magic of these ancient paths and traditions.
